abstract: Christopher Clarey On Tennis column notes that Serena Williams chose not to compete in China Open or WTA Finals, ending her 2015 season, citing injuries; holds that decision would be particularly disappointing if it had been inspired by lack of motivation following loss at US Open.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams announced that she would not play in the China Open in Beijing next week or the WTA Finals in Singapore later this month, citing a need to recover from injuries.

headline.main: In Painful News for Tour, Serena Williams Ends Her Season
headline.print_headline: Williams Is Hurting. Now, So Is the Tour.

snippet: Serena Williams announced that she would not play in the China Open in Beijing next week or the WTA Finals in Singapore later this month, citing a need to recover from injuries.
